scripts.template: mustache ../../../config/$NETWORK.js subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../../config/$NETWORK.js utils/constants.template.ts > utils/constants.ts && mustache ../../../config/$NETWORK.js utils/pricing.template.ts > utils/pricing.ts
scripts.deploy: graph deploy --node https://graph-deploy.goerli.linea.build --ipfs https://graph-ipfs.goerli.linea.build sectafi/dex-goerli subgraph.yaml
scripts.pdeploy: graph deploy --node https://graph-deploy.linea.build --ipfs https://graph-ipfs.linea.build sectafi/dex subgraph.yaml
